meanings.definition: To take by force or skill
meanings.sent1: The brave knight tried to capture the dragon.
meanings.sent2: The police managed to capture the thief after a long chase.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat tried to capture the elusive red dot.
meanings.sent4: Her beautiful painting managed to capture the essence of the sunset.
meanings.sent5: The photograph perfectly captured the joy of the family reunion.

meanings.sent1: The spider tried to capture the fly in its web.

meanings.sent3: The young boy tried to capture the attention of his busy parents.
meanings.sent4: Her smile captured his heart from the very first moment.
meanings.sent5: The net was able to capture all the butterflies in the garden.
